The Gift that Keeps on Giving
Thanks to the generosity of our donors, the following awards have been established at SIT to recognise and encourage academic excellence among our students.
The awards will only be given if there are candidates of sufficient merit.

article_texts:
Awards
Thanks to the generosity of our donors, the following awards have been established at SIT to recognise and encourage academic excellence among our students.
The awards will only be given if there are candidates of sufficient merit.
arrow--right
